title: Google Pixel 3 XL battery swollen
content: I think it's time to say good-bye to my Google Pixel 3 XL... I've been using this phone for a year and a half, and got a lot of love. It is really sad to say good-bye to this phone. I'm not sure Google will offer replacement for this phone... Will you?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
